attributes.action: intervene to hitherto cancel the proposed merger of lostock college and stretford high school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stretford high school has been proposed to merge with lostock college to form an academy. whilst the vast, vast majority of parents oppose the merger, the council fails to listen to reason and insists on forcing the merger to go forward.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the education department of your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
